I took a stab at this and slapped enough spackle on this code to get it wor=
king.

  https://github.com/cmiles74/heritrix-hdfs-writer

I haven't done a=
 lot of testing but it does write the crawl data to a SequenceFile at the s=
pecified HDFS path.

--
Miles

ompile cleanly against the current Heritrix 3.1 release and I am interested=
